'''2.5.9''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on June 27, 2023.

== Fixes ==
* Accessibility updates and bug fixes.
* Fixes to Launcher open/closed setting control.
* Various build distribution updates & fixes.
* Linux build bug fixes.
* {{bug|MCL-23130}} - Launching Custom Older Minecraft Version Causes Game Breakage and Soft Lock
* {{bug|MCL-23385}} - Unable to launch multiple instances of the same type
* {{bug|MCL-23411}} - Minecraft Error message strings displayed within the Launcher are untranslatable
